entities.description: The time frame of the past 30 days, including today's date.
Number of whole days missed from school due to sickness or injury.
The reason for missing school, specifically due to being sick or injured.
Number of days missed due to staying home with a sick child or family member.
The economic background of an individual, possibly related to income or employment status.
The highest level of education completed by an individual.
The mental health condition or status of an individual.
An area defined as rural based on geographic or population criteria.
The usage of tobacco, alcohol, or drugs by an individual.
A diagnosed disorder related to the abuse of substances.
The receipt of treatment for substance use or mental health issues.
